title: Caroline
creator_credit: Clement Perron, Georges Dufaux and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: To the public she is the pleasant, never-ruffled handler of everyone’s complaints at the telephone company. But behind her calm exterior the film reveals her doubts about her personal life, the domestic world of husband and child.
creator_credit_for_label: Clement Perron, Georges Dufaux and National Film Board of Canada
